players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated Bob. Trust me."
Bob: "Charlie is dead because of the mafia, and I'm not the one who killed him."
Diana: "Let's work together to uncover the mafia and protect the villagers. I know Charlie was killed by the mafioso, and Bob has admitted he is not the killer. We need to focus on Alice now."
You: "I will remain silent for now. Let's see how things develop tonight."
Bob: "I think Alice is the mafioso and I'm going to investigate her tonight."
